subject: Re: [junit] Re: Executing dynamic tests

messageBody:

<snip />
> And it worked...and there was much rejoicing.

That's all that counts.

> I'm not sure if this implementation is ideal, but it seems to work so
> far. I really appreciate the help, because it got me thinking about
> this a bit differently and pushed me down the right track.

I'm glad I could help.
